text: Pizza Tower is a 2023 platform game created by the indie developer Tour De Pizza. It was released for Windows. The game is about a pizza chef named Peppino Spaghetti. He must reach the top of a large tower to save his pizzeria from being destroyed by Pizzaface, a giant flying pizza. The gameplay consists of increasing the score, keeping combos going, finding secrets, and moving fast. Peppino has a lot of moves and attacks to do these things. At the end of each level, the player activates an escape sequence in which they must return to the beginning of the level while a timer goes down. Unlike most other platform games, the player does not have health or lives. Pizza Tower was released on January 26, 2023. It was well-liked by reviewers and players alike. They praised its gameplay, aesthetics, music, humor, and similarities to the Wario Land series. == References == Category:2023 video games Category:Indie video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Platform games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about food and drink Category:Windows games
